Package org.apache.jackrabbit.core.state

Interface Summary
ItemStateListener The ItemStateListener interface allows an implementing object to be informed about changes on an ItemState.
ItemStateProvider The ItemStateProvider interface...
PersistableItemState PersistableItemState ...
PersistenceManager PersistenceManager ...
 

Class Summary
ItemState ItemState represents the state of an Item.
ItemStateCache An ItemStateCache maintains a cache of ItemState instances.
NodeReferences NodeReferences represents the references (i.e. properties of type REFERENCE) to a particular node (denoted by its uuid).
NodeState NodeState represents the state of a Node.
NodeState.ChildNodeEntry ChildNodeEntry specifies the name, index (in the case of same-name siblings) and the UUID of a child node entry.
NodeState.PropertyEntry PropertyEntry specifies the name of a property entry.
PersistentItemStateManager PersistentItemStateManager ...
PersistentNodeState PersistentNodeState represents the persistent state of a Node.
PersistentPropertyState PersistentPropertyState represents the persistent state of a Property.
PropertyState PropertyState represents the state of a Property.
ReferenceManager ReferenceManager ...
SessionItemStateManager SessionItemStateManager ...
SessionItemStateManager.PathComparator Comparator used to sort canonical Path objects hierarchically (in depth-first tree traversal order).
TransientItemStateManager TransientItemStateManager ...
